MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the EH23 postcode area of Gorebridge. It was necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 5:08pm due to a fault on the electrical network near to Borthwick Mains and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 7:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was recorded at 6:20 PM on Tuesday, 23 February 2021.
